name: Custom post type templates for Elementor
author: Michael Gangolf

sections.description:
With the help of this plug-in you can link you posts or a custom post type detail pages to a normal Elementor page. You can style that Elementor page and customize the look & feel of that detail page with elements like post title, post image or post content.

Build your own templates with the free version of Elementor.

How to use it

  • create a custom post type
  • create an Elementor page and add the included elements (post title, post image, post content)
  • go to Elementor - Custom post pages and define your rules
  • open the post
sections.changelog:
1.10.1
* tested with WP 6.5

1.10.0
* fix for ACF fields

1.1.9
* fix for ACF fields

1.1.8
* print newlines in normal page text

1.1.7
* tested with latest version

1.1.6
* JS bugfix

1.1.5
* JS bugfix

1.1.4
* Add ACF support for normal posts

1.1.3
* full rewrite of the redirect part
* show select field for post selection in “List posts”
* display custom posts that are created with Elementor

1.1.2
* fix post content output

1.1.1
* post page title will use the post title now

1.1.0
* demo video
* bugfixes

1.0.9
* output posts with Elementor styles correctly
* bugfixes: date output, edit posts with Elementor

1.0.8
* filter
* much more styling options
* bugfixes

1.0.7
* posts list styling

1.0.6
* added missing files

1.0.5
* post date
* more content and styling for “posts list”

1.0.4
* allow default posts

1.0.3
* revert last change

1.0.2
* allow build-in post types

1.0.1
* added many styling options for the widgets

1.0.0
* Initial release.
